TextView.android:text: After a five-year renovation and expansion that was completed in 2014, the Picasso Museum looks better than ever. Devised by architect Jean-François Bodin, the enhanced space includes more square footage, inserting contemporary white-wall galleries into the Hôtel Salé, a Baroque 17th-century mansion. Keep an eye out for mesmerizing plaster-white lighting and furniture by Diego Giacometti.
